job.title: Remote Application Support /Site Reliability Engineer
job.industry: Information Services,Information Technology and Services,Financial Services
job.description:
What you have:   - 2-3+ years of systems and/or applications support in an enterprise environment.   
  - Passion for learning, reliability, automation, orchestration and continual improvement.   
  - Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related discipline, or equivalent experience.   
  - Firm current Linux and Windows Server Administration experience.   
  - Strong verbal and written communication skills.   
  - Experience supporting middleware infrastructure (IIS, Tomcat,Websphere, etc).   
  - Experience with Enterprise batch scheduling tools is a plus.   
  - Experience with Continuous Delivery/Integration, Infrastructure as Code, Splunk, AppDynamics and Salt Stack a plus.   
  - Experience in Agile methodologies, Kanban, CI/CD, Definition of Done and use of Atlassian Tools, Confluence, and Jira.
